title: What is
description: Sandi is Qatar's national platform for charitable and social aid management. It ensures fairness, security, and transparency in donations by unifying data across organizations, preventing fraud, and building trust between donors, charities, and beneficiaries.

features.title: Fairness & Security
features.desc: Prevents duplicate beneficiaries, ensuring aid reaches those who truly need it.

features.title: Unified Records
features.desc: Maintains a centralized national database of all charitable transactions.

features.title: Collaboration
features.desc: Connects charities, government, and donors for more impactful giving.
